alert.note: Alert for Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 16 at 2:36PM MDT until March 17 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 4 inches. Greater amounts possible across the highest terrain. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, West Central Mountains, and Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Noon MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; West Central Mountains
